caption: Table 1: Performance on RLBench with 5 Demonstrations. All numbers represent percentage success rates averaged over 3 seeds. See Appendix F for standard deviation. SGRv2 outperforms the most competitive baseline RVT on 23/26 tasks, with an average improvement of 1.32x.
description: Table 1 presents the average success rates of different methods on 26 RLBench tasks using only 5 demonstrations, showing SGRv2's superior performance compared to other baselines.
